ygData.subject: Re: What a Game!!!!!!!!!!!11
ygData.msgSnippet: There are several things you can do to improve your night vision as a Human/Erudite/Barbarian. Buy a Lightstone. Wisps drop them and they usually sell
ygData.messageBody:
There are several things you can do to improve
your night vision as a
Human/Erudite/Barbarian.<br><br>Buy a Lightstone. Wisps drop them and they usually
sell for roughly 1pp. Greater Lightstones are better
but they average 5pp.<br><br>Get a level 4 or higher
Magician to summon you a wisp stone.<br><br>Buy a
lantern.<br><br>Get someone to cast Serpent Sight on you. It is a
spell that grants infravision. Several classes get it
at various levels including Enchanters at 12 and
Shaman at 9.<br><br>Hope this list helps you
out.<br><br><br>Nelmunbar<br>Enchanter on Brell
